title: 3D Cafe — Rotate chairs to face the table

requirements.summary: Adjust chair Y-rotations in both CafeEnvironment and BasicCafeRoomFallback so all four chairs face toward the table at [0, 0, 2] without changing positions or assets.
acceptanceCriteria: In CafeEnvironment, the two chairs positioned at z=1.3 (in front of the table) are rotated to face +Z (toward the table), and the two chairs positioned at z=2.7 (behind the table) are rotated to face -Z (toward the table).
In BasicCafeRoomFallback, the chair rotations match the full environment so all four chairs face toward the table.
Visual check: when viewing the scene, each chair’s backrest is oriented away from the table and the seat opening faces the table.

file_operations.description: Update the four <WoodenChair> instances around the table at [0, 0, 2] so both chairs at z=1.3 use a rotation that makes the seat opening face +Z, and both chairs at z=2.7 use a rotation that makes the seat opening face -Z; do not change any chair/table positions or materials.

Mirror the same chair rotation fixes as CafeEnvironment for the four <WoodenChair> instances around the table at [0, 0, 2], ensuring the fallback scene matches the full environment (no repositioning, geometry, or material changes).
